short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Light tab- a spectrum of soft pastel wallpapers that will look pretty on your background and contribute to a calmness while working.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Carefully designed extension to help you boost your focus and concentration.

Light Tab is one of those extensions that prolongs your life! 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Light Tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

New tab search will be powered by Yahoo. 

We created this extension for people who needs a gateway from work and other obligations. Whenever you feel like you lost motivation, concentration or desire to work, just open a new tab so you see all these remarkably calm wallpapers that will sharpen your focus. Are you spotting the icon in the top left corner? Just click on that one and magic happens! A new wallpaper will appear every time you click on it. But do not to do it to quickly - take time to enjoy simplicity of soft pastel wallpapers. 

In this chaotic time when every person has so much obligations and not so much time, we implemented a feature that will be quite useful for all users - clock. We planted it on the middle of the screen, right in the center of these remarkable pictures. It is quite visible, you can't miss it! You will be able to better arrange your duties and leisure time by utilizing our new tab extension.

The search features use within the extension will be powered by Microsoft Bing. However, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.
This shortcut will save you a lot of time and remind you to do the search you need for work and fun. Just like the clock, we placed it in the center of the extension, in the place where all important stuff are situated. 

In case you would like to know more about our Privacy Policy and learn how we protect your data, click on the link in the bottom-right part of your screen. By doing that, you will open a webpage with all the details. 
If you find yourself in some kind of doubt, click on the Contact Us link which you can find next to Privacy Policy. You will automatically be redirected to our page where you can fill the form and you will get your answers as soon as possible. 

You can also find links for all the information here: 
HOMEPAGE: https://lighttab.me/index.html
PRIVACY POLICY: https://lighttab.me/privacy-policy.html
EULA: https://lighttab.me/eula.html

You can easily approach us by sending the mail on the owner's address:
Advanced Business Developments LLC

1712 Pioneer Ave. Ste 500
Cheyenne, WY 82001

To uninstall the extension, follow these steps:
1. Open extensions menu
2. Find extension 
3. Click on the three dots 
4. Click "Remove from Chrome"
